titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar College Astronomy Department Records, 1888-1936
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Elizabeth Clarke April 2007

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Record books and notebooks, including transit room and dome books containing records of astronomical observations, 1888-1912; variable stars records, 1907-1913; records of observations from the meridian room, 1888-1936; and notebooks from observations, lectures, and studies, some of which were kept by Mary W. Whitney.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: These records include transit room and dome books containing records of astronomical observations, 1888-1912; variable stars records, 1907-1913; records of observations from the meridian room, 1888-1936; and notebooks from observations, lectures, and studies, some of which were kept by Mary W. Whitney.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

relatedmaterial.archref: Publications of the Vassar College Observatory, no. 1 (1900)

dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
